College of Medicine nke Lagos State University nke a mara nke ọma dị ka LASUCOM bụ otu n'ime College of Medicine kachasị elu na Naịjirịa.

Kọleji ahụ dị n'ime usoro nke Ụlọ Ọgwụ Nkụzi Mahadum Steeti Lagos.
E guzobere ya na afọ 1999 n'okpuru nchịkwa nke Col.Mohammed Buba Marwa onye nyere ụlọ a maara dị ka Ayinke House na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ.
Kọleji ahụ malitere site na ọzụzụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụike nke dugara na onyinye nke Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (MB;BS) Degree ma gbasaa na mmemme ndị ọzọ dị ka Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS), Bachelor of Nursing Science (BN.Sc), Bachelor of Science, Physiology (B.Sc
Pharmacology) na mmemme postgraduate na Physiology, Anatomy, Medical Biochemistry na Public Health.Ọ nwere ngalaba atọ ugbu a, sayensị ahụike bụ isi, sayensụ ahụike bụ basic na sayensị Clinical.
LASUCOM bụkwa kọleji ọgwụ na-eto ngwa ngwa na Naịjirịa.
